name: editor
description: Music Notation Editor POC with Cell-based architecture

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run watch-wasm" "npm run watch" "npm run dev:server" --names "WASM,rollup,server" --prefix-colors "yellow,blue,green"
scripts.watch-wasm: cargo watch -s 'cargo build --profile=fast-build --target wasm32-unknown-unknown && wasm-pack build . --target web --out-dir dist/pkg --dev --no-opt'
scripts.build: npm run build-css && npm run build-wasm && npm run build-js
scripts.build-prod: npm run build-css && npm run build-wasm -- --release && npm run build-js
scripts.serve: npm run build && npm run dev
scripts.serve-prod: npm run build-prod && python3 -m http.server 8080 --directory dist
scripts.setup: npm install && cargo install wasm-pack && playwright install

author: Editor Project
